title: Clinical Practice Competency Enhancement: Introduction to Psychology: Theory and Application

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain major psychological theories (cognitive, developmental, social psychology, etc.) with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can write reports applying psychological theories by analyzing real-world cases.
Learners can achieve over 70 points on standardized final exams.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
